artist: Painter: After Ludovico Carracci; Publisher: John Young; Publisher: John Murray
description: Susanna kneeling facing right looking left holding edge of fabric in porper left hand; two figures behind, one pulling fabric and other gesturing with hand; dim figure in upper left corner
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ L. CARRACCI/ London, March 20, 1823, Published by J. Young 65 Upper Charlotte Street, Fitzroy Square/ and by/ John Murray, Albermarle Street]; in pencil on sheet: [2-226]
portfolio: From Catalogue of the Celebrated Collection of Pictures of John Julius Angerstein
title: Susanna and the Elders
